name: comdock
description: COMDOCK is a web application that allows you to view simulated fake company informations.
author: NCS Northware (https://github.com/ncs-northware)

scripts.dev: concurrently -n FRONT,BACK -c auto,auto "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:back"
scripts.start: concurrently -n FRONT,BACK -c auto,auto "npm run start:frontend" "npm run backstart:win"
scripts.build: concurrently -n FRONT,BACK -c auto,auto "npm run build:frontend" "npm run build:back"
scripts.build:win: concurrently -n FRONT,BACK -c auto,auto "npm run build:frontend" "npm run winbuild:back"
